readMe: Don't modify this file! It has valuable information for the game.

descriptions.BREAD: Restores 10-15 HP, either increases DEF or ATK by 12-15
descriptions.POTATO: Restores 5-15 HP, might increase your ATK by 6.
descriptions.DICE_OF_FATE: Play with fate and see if you get lucky.
descriptions.MEDKIT: Restores 20-45 HP. Can't be used with full health.
